story_galar_01_08000/2401_1001_0200_10: Is that the application form for the arena?
story_galar_01_08000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Yeah! I want to host a massive event with
Pokémon battles!
story_galar_01_08000/2401_1001_0400_10:
We’re planning on hosting it with everyone
from Galar!
story_galar_01_08000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I see... Unfortunately, Chairman Rose has already
submitted an application.
story_galar_01_08000/2401_1001_0700_10: Then how about a different stadium?
story_galar_01_08000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Chairman Rose has submitted applications for all
of them.
story_galar_01_08000/2401_1001_0900_10: The only place available is the village square.
